Binding assays were performed by incubating 0.2-0.6 nM (34,000-100,000 dpm) [<sup>3</sup>H]CP55940 with membranes prepared from cells expressing cloned human CB1 or CB2 receptors in buffer A (50 mM Tris HCl, pH 7.0, 5.0 mM MgCl<sub>2</sub>, 1.0 mM EGTA and 1.0 mg/mL fatty acid free bovine serum albumin).
Nonspecific binding was determined in the presence of 10 μM WIN55212-2.
